law.text:
The commissioner shall make or may approve and adopt reasonable rules and regulations, consistent with this subtitle, for any and all of the following purposes:
Effectuation of the Surplus Lines Law; and
Establishment of procedures through which determination is to be made as to the eligibility of particular proposed coverages for export.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1100, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 10, sec. 21, effective June 18, 1970.
